subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=1|rs=一02}}

# [[above]], [[high]], [[up]]
# [[earlier]]
# [[excellent]], [[top]]
# [[certain]] [[time]] or [[place]] in the [[past]]
# [[limit]]
# [[climb]], [[rise]]
# [[offer]]
# [[go]] to the [[center]]
# [[raise]], [[bring up]]
# one of the {{w|four tones}} of {{w|Middle Chinese}}
# {{short for|lang=ja|nocap=1|[[上野]][[上野国|国]]|tr=Kōzuke no kuni|nodot=1|sort=しよう'}}: {{w|Kōzuke Province}}

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=じょう<じやう
|kanon=しょう<しやう
|soon=しゃん<しやん
|kun=うえ-<うへ-, うわ-<うは-, かみ-, あ-げる, あ-がる, のぼ-る, のぼ-す, のぼ-せる, たてまつ-る, ほとり-
|nanori=かど, こう<かう, すすむ, たかし
}}

subSections.title: Noun

subSections.text: * {{ja-r|下|した}}

Suffix

# ''suffix addressing to a [[superior]]''

# [[upper]], [[over]]

subSections.title: Derived terms

subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|うわ|hhira=うは}}

# ''a [[place name]]''

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|へ}}
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|え}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The senses are the same with ''ue''.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|尾上|おのえ}}

subSections.title: Etymology 4
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|かみ|acc=1|acc_ref=SMK2,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かみ}}

# the [[start]]
# a [[high]] [[place]]; the [[top]]
# one with [[higher]] [[rank]]

subSections.title: Antonyms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|下|しも}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Idioms
Proper noun
Etymology 5
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|かん}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かん}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=かん|obsolete}} ''Same as'' {{m|ja||かみ|tr=kami}} ''above''

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Generally only found when followed by the [[genitive]] / [[possessive]] particles {{ja-r|の}} or {{ja-r|つ}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|かん}}

# ''a [[place name]]''
